channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Rensselaer at Work to Hold Information Session July 18
item.description: Date: Thursday, July 18, 2024 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - Register to join Rensselaer at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph. D., as he reviews Rensselaer’s online, project-based graduate degrees and certificates, and describes how RPI Instructor Mentors provide industry expertise, advice, and mentorship in a targeted and experiential learning environment.
item.author: Community

item.title: “Tackle Your Debt” Webinar to be Held July 17
item.description: Date: Wednesday, July 17, 2024 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM - The Off-Campus Commons, in partnership with Broadview Federal Credit Union, presents this webinar to discuss a basic budgeting framework, and help participants develop effective debt pay-down strategy, gain understanding for debt levels, and reflect on what is considered good debt and bad debt. Please register in advance!
item.author: Community

item.title: CCPD: MathWorks Info Session to be Held July 18
item.description: From 6:30PM to 7:30PM on Thursday, July 18, students are welcome to join the MathWorks team to learn about the company’s career paths and culture, as well as upcoming opportunities for Arch students seeking an Away experience. Also take a minute to review the Engineering Development Group Spring Co-Op opportunity posted in Handshake.
item.author: Students

item.title: Registration Now Open for Summer 2024 Undergraduate Research Fair
item.description: Date: Monday, June 24, 2024 - Wed , July 17, 2024 (all day) - Undergraduate students of all majors who are participating in summer research are encouraged to register by July 17 for the Summer 2024 Undergraduate Research Fair, which will be hosted by the School of Science and take place from 3:00PM to 5:00PM on Wednesday, July 31 in the CBIS Atrium. It’s a great opportunity to present your work to the faculty and your peers!
item.author: Students

item.title: Don’t Miss the Arch Mid-Summer Celebration!
item.description: Date: Wednesday, July 17, 2024 5:00 PM - 7:00 PM - Stop by the 86’ Field for carnival food, rock painting, music, adoption-a-plant, lawn games, fire pits and a competition between schools! The student-selected menu will operate in place of the regular dining hall options this evening.
item.author: Students

item.title: Registration Still Open for the Capital Region Basketball Camp at RPI!
item.description: Register now to enjoy the convenience of dropping your child off at a sports camp right where you work! Enrolled members with CDPHP can request a fitness reimbursement for this camp of up to $200 per plan year, for all covered dependents combined.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: TIAA Holding Confidential In-Person Retirement Counseling Sessions July 18
item.description: Date: Thursday, July 18, 2024 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM - A TIAA Financial Consultant will be available for one-on-one consultations on a broad range of retirement topics. Attend this upcoming event to help you become better informed and more confident about Rensselaer’s retirement plan benefits!
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: NSF Engineering Directorate Visit to be Held July 18
item.description: Date: Thursday, July 18, 2024 3:30 PM - 4:30 PM - Register to join Rensselaer’s Office for Research for a visit by Dr. Susan Margulies of the National Science Foundation, who leads the Engineering Directorate and manages its nearly $800 million budget. Dr. Margulies will present on NSF Engineering’s priorities and funding opportunities, followed by a Q&A session.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: CCPD to Host “Using Handshake for Undergrad Research Postings” Faculty Training
item.description:
On Wednesday, July 17 from 1:00PM to 2:30PM in the CCPD conference room, the CCPD will host an interactive opportunity for faculty members to learn how to use Handshake for posting undergraduate research positions. Lunch will be provided. Space is limited, so interested faculty should submit a registration webform to sign up as soon as possible.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
